title: Melbourne Theatre Guide - What's Playing in...
text:
State Theatre , Arts Centre Melbourne, St Kilda Rd, Melbourne. July 17-21. $49.90-$95.90. Bookings: 1300-182-183 or ticketmaster.com.au . Confessions of a Control Freak , Belinda Raisin Butterfly Club , 5 Carson Pl, Melbourne. July 2 at 9.30pm, $15/$12; July 3 at 6pm, July 4 at 7pm, $25/$23/$20. Bookings: 03-9663-8107 or thebutterflyclub.com . The Dragon by Evgeny Shwarz Merlyn Theatre , The Malthouse, 113 Sturt St Southbank. June 27-July 14. Bookings: 03-9685-5111. Flower Children: The Mamas and Papas Story Comedy Theatre , 240 Exhibition St, Melbourne. Until June 23. Bookings: ticketmaster.com.au . Hot Shoe Shuffle Her Majesty's Theatre , 219 Exhibition St, Melbourne. From August 10. $79-$125. Bookings: hmt.com.au . King Kong Regent Theatre , 191 Collins St, Melbourne. Bookings: 1300-111-011 or ticketmaster.com.au . The Last Five Years by Jason Robert Brown Tall Trees Productions Treble Clef Jazz Lounge , 17 Paynes Rd, Chirnside Park. June 26-28 at 8pm, June 29 at 6pm and 9pm. Bookings: talltreesproductions.com . Legally Blonde the Musical Princess Theatre , 163 Spring St, Melbourne. Until August 25. Bookings: ticketmaster.com.au/legallyblonde . Little Shop of Horrors Frankston Arts Centre , Davey St, Frankston. July 19-27. $43/$38/$29. Bookings: 03-9784-1060 or plos.asn.au . Solomon and Marion by Lara Foot Fairfax Studio , Arts Centre Melbourne, St Kilda Rd, Melbourne. Until July 20. Opening June 12 at 8pm. From $58/under 30s $33. Bookings: 03-8688-0800, 1300-182-183, mtc.com.au or artsentremelbourne.com.au or . A Storm in a D Cup , Amelia Ryan Kew Court House , 188 High St, Kew. June 29-30. $36/$33/$30. Bookings: melbournecabaret.com . The Wiggles Live in Concert Comedy Theatre , 240 Exhibition St, Melbourne. June 29-30. Bookings: ticketmaster.com.au . 
Theatre listings for the greater Melbourne area should be sent by email in text format only to goaustralia@aboutguide.com . Please include specific theatre name and address, performance dates, ticket prices, and Internet or telephone booking information.
